T12n2957u_001:1036: āryamañjuśriya eva vā ye sarve guṇāḥ prajñāvāhyāḥ prakāmaṁ tānanuhartuṁ śīlaṁ yeṣām |
T12n2957u_001:1038: anaṅgasya jayanaśīlā buddhā adhipā bodhisattvānāṁ nāthāḥ |
T12n2957u_001:1047: tena jagatyāmiti dvādaśākṣare cchandasi vaṁśasthaṁ nāma ||
T12n2957u_001:1066: ativistarairapi girāṁ sugiro guṇapāramīyuradhinātha na te |
T12n2957u_001:1072: te tava guṇānāṁ pāraṁ paryantaṁ girāṁ vistarairapi na īyurna gatāḥ | ke |
T12n2957u_001:1076: pramitānyakṣarāṇi yasyāṁ tādṛśyapi mama nutiḥ subhagaiva śobhanaiva |
T12n2957u_001:1085: bhāratī bhāratīśa svabhāvojjvalā tvāmupaiti svayaṁ sadguṇasragviṇī || 54 ||
T12n2957u_001:1090: bhāratī sarasvatī svayaṁ svayaṁvare ca tvāmupaityāśrayati |
T12n2957u_001:1093: santo ye guṇā bhagavata eva teṣāṁ sragmālā |
T12n2957u_001:1096: tathā dīpyamānā akhilā yā alaṁkṛtayaḥ kāvyālaṁkṛtayastābhiḥ śrlāghā yasyāḥ |
T12n2957u_001:1099: puṇyabhājāṁ bodhisattvānāṁ mukhāmbhojāllabdha udaya utpattiryayā sā tathārūpiṇyapi sarasvatī dīpyamānākhilālaṁkāraśrlāghinī |
T12n2957u_001:1102: san śobhano guṇaḥ sūtraṁ yasyāṁ tādṛśī sragasyā astīti sragviṇī |
T12n2957u_001:1108: bhaṅgaṁ nītāste pañcabāṇasya bāṇāḥ śānto dveṣāgnirmohajāḍyaṁ nirastam |
T12n2957u_001:1109: nātha trailokyānugrahavyagramūrte saṁpat saṁprāptā vaiśvadevī tvayaiva || 55 ||
T12n2957u_001:1114: viśve ca te devāśca teṣāmiyaṁ vaiśvadevī saṁpattvayaiva saṁprāptā nānyena |
T12n2957u_001:1116: yatastvayā pañcabāṇasya te bāṇā bhaṅga nītāḥ prāpitāḥ |
T12n2957u_001:1122: atra ca vināpi tena cārtho labhyate |
T12n2957u_001:1128: na hi svayamasiddhaḥ parārtha sādhayitumadhīṣṭa iti |
T12n2957u_001:1129: athavā yadi rāgādayo bhagavataḥ prahīṇāstadā tvatpresattvārtha hānirityāha |
T12n2957u_001:1133: bāṇāḥ pañca te cātra bhaṅga nītāḥ ||
T12n2957u_001:1146: atidhairyācca ambhorāśeḥ samudrasya yatiṁ saṁyamamācāraṁ dhatse |
T12n2957u_001:1147: tathā jaladharamālāyā līlāṁ dhatse iti yojyam |
T12n2957u_001:1151: sā cāsau saddharmāmbudhārā ca tasyā savātāstaiḥ |
T12n2957u_001:1155: vṛttapakṣe 'mbhorāśeryatimati jagatyāṁ jaladharamālā dhatta iti saṁbandhanīyam |
T12n2957u_001:1158: tava puraḥ paramottamasaṁmatāḥ pratibhayā vikalāḥ prativādinaḥ |
T12n2957u_001:1163: he parama tava purata uttamatvena saṁmatā api prativādino bṛhaspatyādayaḥ |
T12n2957u_001:1166: drutaṁ vā vilambitaṁ vā yaduccāritaṁ vacaḥ |
T12n2957u_001:1174: te'pi yadi drutaṁ vilambitaṁ vā vacanamuccārayanti |
T12n2957u_001:1175: tadā tadapi bahu manyante mṛtādvaraṁ drubalateti nyāyāt |
T12n2957u_001:1185: tritayamapi jagat pavitrayantī bhavataḥ kīrtiḥ prabhavati |
T12n2957u_001:1200: harati nitāntamiyaṁ tava kīrtiḥ kṛtihṛdayāni dayānijavāsa |
T12n2957u_001:1201: prasavacayena citeva samantāddiśi diśi kundalatā dalatālam || 59 ||
T12n2957u_001:1205: yathā samantāddalatā vikasatā prasavacayena puṣpanivahena citā vyāptā kundalatā |
T12n2957u_001:1207: diśi diśi kṛtināṁ sukṛtināṁ hṛdayāni harati |
T12n2957u_001:1209: iyamanantaroditā tava kīrtirdiśi diśi samantāt prasarantī paṇḍitahṛdayāni nitāntaṁ harati ||
T12n2957u_001:1220: dhṛtā dharmadhātuvāgīśvarasya buddhasya līlā yena sa eṣa ko'pi kṛpāsamudraḥ |
T12n2957u_001:1223: upāttaḥ saṁbhṛtaḥ śobhānāṁ samavāyo yena tathā |
T12n2957u_001:1228: vṛttapakṣe dalamardha pādānāṁ tatra yatyā prāptaḥ san śobhāsamavāyo yena sa tathā |
T12n2957u_001:1240: rūcāṁ cayān tavaiva kāyakiraṇanikarāṇāṁ kāntyā prakarṣeṇa vikiratīva cchurayatīva |
T12n2957u_001:1242: viyattaraṅgiṇyāstaralataraṅgāṇāmiva rūk kāntiryeṣāṁ teṣāmapi viśadatvāt vicchinnavisāritvācca |
T12n2957u_001:1244: athavā tava daśāntare yathoktarūcāṁ cayān pravikirati sati |
T12n2957u_001:1251: manohārihārāvalīramyamīdṛk kka te nātha rūpaṁ surūpādhirāja |
T12n2957u_001:1257: manohāriṇyā hārāvalyā ramyaṁ tava kkedṛśaṁ rūpam |
T12n2957u_001:1258: surūpādhirājetyanena rūpābhimānivinayanārtha tādṛṅ mahārājalīlādinirmāṇaṁ darśitamiti darśayati |
T12n2957u_001:1259: kka cātiśa yaṁ durdāntasattvānāṁ praśamarthaṁ sfurantaścalanto bhīmā bhayānakā bhūṣārthaṁ ye bhujaṅgāstaiḥ prayātamāśritaṁ yamāryādirūpam |
T12n2957u_001:1272: suṣṭhu rūcirā mallikāyāḥ samaye yauvanadaśāyāṁ sevyā pratinavā abhinavā yā mālā yad vā surūcirā mallikā kāle sevyā yā pratinavā mālā mallikāyā eva sā yasyā asti mūrteḥ |
T12n2957u_001:1273: saiva taveyaṁ mūrtiḥ kasya na cittaṁ harati |
T12n2957u_001:1277: sa eva vā bhūśā yasyāḥ sā ||
T12n2957u_001:1283: tava nātha paraṁ yadi kāntisudhājaladhau śramamujzhati zhātkṛtini |
T12n2957u_001:1290: jagannayanaṁ tava kāntireva sudhājaladhistarimañzhātkṛtini śramamāyāsaṁ paramujzhati |
T12n2957u_001:1295: śubhaṁ manoharaṁ rūpaṁ tasya nirūpaṇe lampaṭakaṁ sat paritaḥ samantādaṭatītyarthaḥ |
T12n2957u_001:1334: yo bhavantamapi vāgīśvaraṁ śrayañjaḍā mandā uddhatā vikṣiptā gatirmatiryasya sa tathābhūtaḥ san |
T12n2957u_001:1344: locanotsavavidhāsu tanubhṛtāṁ candra vartma samupaiti bhavabhidām || 67 ||
T12n2957u_001:1349: tava prasādena samudīrṇaṁ samṛddhaṁ yacchubhaṁ tatsāmarthyāt kṛtijanaḥ sukhamevākaṣṭenaiva bhavabhidāmāryāṇāṁ vartma mārgaṁ samupaiti prāpnoti
T12n2957u_001:1365: sukhaṁ ca duḥkhaṁ ca tayoratiśaya ādiryeṣāṁ sukhamādyādīnāṁ teṣāṁ hetu jātairapi |
T12n2957u_001:1370: tava pādāśrayeṇa labdho buddheḥ sāro balaṁ yaiste tathābhūtā yasmāt |
T12n2957u_001:1384: tava caraṇayoḥ paricaraṇe parīṣṭau rūciryeṣāṁ teṣāṁ sukhaṁ yathā bhavati tathā kimapyadbhutaṁ kṛtināṁ rūpaṁ svarūpaṁ kṛtitvamudayati jagatyām
T12n2957u_001:1386: nikhilasya malapaṭalasya vigamāddīpro dīpanaśīlaḥ prathimā pṛthutvaṁ yeṣām |
T12n2957u_001:1388: athavā nikhilamalapaṭalavigamadīpraṁ ca tatprathimaguṇena mahitamati ceti karmadhārayaḥ ||
T12n2957u_001:1399: iha jagati mañjughoṣa iti prathitaḥ khyāto jinamānasamevaikā utkṛṣṭā yā nalinī tatra kalahaṁsa iva kalahaṁso vo yuṣmān avyāt |
T12n2957u_001:1402: tathā ca rabhasaḥ kaladhautaṁ svarṇe rūpye iti |
T12n2957u_001:1403: paṭvī yā bhāratī saiva varaṭā haṁsīti tayā satatānugamāt |
T12n2957u_001:1405: nalinyāṁ kalapradhāno'pi haṁsa iha jagati mañjurghoṣo 'syeti mañjughoṣa iti prathitaḥ |
T12n2957u_001:1407: uttamaceṣṭaḥ kaladhautaṁ rūpyaṁ tadvat śuddhavapuśca bhavati ||
T12n2957u_001:1414: vicchedastriṣu yadi duḥsaheṣvamīṣu kleśeṣu sfuṭamaṇuśo 'pi duṣkaraḥ syāt |
T12n2957u_001:1415: prāpyeta kka nu khalu nātha mūrtirīdṛk trailokye nayanamanaḥ praharṣiṇīha || 71 ||
T12n2957u_001:1420: amīṣu rāgadveṣamoheṣu triṣu duḥsaheṣu kleśeṣu sfuṭaṁ vyaktaṁ yo vicchedo vigamaḥ sa yadi duṣkaraḥ syāt |
T12n2957u_001:1423: aṇuśo 'pi sūkṣmapracārāṇāmapi yadi vicchedo duṣkaraḥ kartumaśakyaḥ syāttadeha trailokye īdṛgbhagavato mūrtiḥ kka nu khalu prāpyeta naiva prāpyetetyarthaḥ
T12n2957u_001:1425: nayanaṁ ca manaśca te praharṣayituṁ śīlaṁ yasyāḥ sā tathā |
T12n2957u_001:1433: bhavādṛśāṁ vapuṣi ca kāntisaṁtatiḥ samīkṣyate yadi rūcireyamīdṛśī || 72 ||
T12n2957u_001:1437: iyamīdṛśī rūcirā kānteḥ saṁtatirbhavādṛśāṁ mahābodhisattvānāmeva vapuṣi paramīkṣyate |
T12n2957u_001:1438: apāṁ viratiṁ vigamaṁ vidhāya yadi kadācittasmin |
T12n2957u_001:1441: vṛttapakṣe 'tijagatyāṁ payonidhau viratiṁ vidhāya iyamīdṛśī rūcirā samīkṣyate ||
T12n2957u_001:1451: mandradhvānaiḥ gambhīranirghoṣairamṛtadhārāḥ pravacanapravāhān manohara muccaistvayi muñcati |
T12n2957u_001:1452: ata eva prīṇitabhavye yā yatiścaritaṁ visfurati saiva yatirvarṣā mbhodaṁ vyaktatayā sfuṭamanveti |
T12n2957u_001:1458: vṛttapakṣe rūcirāyā yā yatiranantaroktā caturthe saivātijagatyāṁ mattamayūraṁ vṛttamanveti ||
T12n2957u_001:1467: tvayi trijagatāṁ pramodasya janane janananimittaṁ janake vā |
T12n2957u_001:1468: madhāviva vasanta iva vartamānasyotpalataroḥ ketanendīvaravṛkṣasya latā śākhā jayati |
T12n2957u_001:1471: tathā madhumattānāṁ bhṛṅgāṇāṁ raveṇa mañju bhāṣituṁ śīlaṁ yasyāḥ sā tathā |
T12n2957u_001:1473: tatra cotpalataroḥ śākhā netrakamanīyasumanobhirūllasitā tanmakarandapānamattamadhukarazhāṁkāraiḥ manoharavyāhāriṇīva bhavati ||
T12n2957u_001:1482: manyāmahe jinanayābharaṇaṁ tavaiva vṛttaṁ vasantatilakaṁ navacūtameva || 75 ||
T12n2957u_001:1486: yathā navacūtaṁ vasantasya tilakamalaṁkārabhūtaṁ tathā tavaiva vṛttaṁ caritraṁ jinanayasyābharaṇaṁ manyāmahe |
T12n2957u_001:1490: sarvātiśāyinastavaiva ye guṇāstairnirbharaṁ labdho modo yaiḥ |
T12n2957u_001:1491: cūtamapi sarvātiśāyibhirnijaiḥ saurabhādi guṇairnirbharalabdhamodāni yāni mahuvratakulāni tairvandivṛndairivopagīyamānam |
T12n2957u_001:1504: vādikuladaivata mamandaṁ yathā bhavati tathā abhivande |
T12n2957u_001:1506: bhagavata eva saṁmukhaṁ valan mukhaṁ yasya tasya mṛgāhipateḥ pṛṣṭhārūdamatigādadayamatiśayitakṛpam |
T12n2957u_001:1510: varṇasya saundaryeṇa hema bandhuritaṁ kānteśca himapādaścandra ityarthaḥ ||
T12n2957u_001:1514: tathā ca jayadevaḥ 'siṁhalalitaṁ ca kathitaṁ bhajasanogau ' iti ||
T12n2957u_001:1528: praśamitaḥ praśamaṁ nītaḥ sakalaḥ prapañco grāhyagrāhakādi vikalpo yaḥ |
T12n2957u_001:1530: tābhyāṁ yathāsaṁkhyaṁ prasarantāvamalau yau dhīsamādhī tāveva sudhā tāṁ juṣamāṇasya ||
T12n2957u_001:1543: tava kkacidvajrabhairavādyavasthāviśeṣe bhujaparighāṇāṁ dordaṇḍānāmāvaliḥ saṁhatirativiṣamā vilasati |
T12n2957u_001:1547: pratibhayaṁ bhayaṁkaraṁ vapuryeṣāmakarūṇaṁ yaccaritaṁ tasya kṛpayā praśamanavidhaye ||
T12n2957u_001:1559: duṣprāpāhāryaṁ padamabhilaṣatāṁ tacca tvabhakteranyā varada na digasaṁbādhā || 79 ||
T12n2957u_001:1569: tāṁ ca viṣayebhyo rūpādibhyaḥ pañcakāmaguṇebhyo viratimabhilaṣatāṁ śrāvakagotrāṇāṁ na kevalam |
T12n2957u_001:1575: teṣu viratimabhilaṣatāṁ kavīnāṁ śakkarībhūṣaṇā asaṁbādhā nāma ||
T12n2957u_001:1579: bhavataḥ kalāṁ kimapi saṁyatairindriyaiḥ kkacidādarastimitadhīryadi dhyāyati |
T12n2957u_001:1580: acirāt svayaṁ varayatīyamenaṁ janaṁ vasudhā dhruvaṁ jaladhiśakkarībhūṣaṇā || 80 ||
T12n2957u_001:1585: ādareṇa stimitā vikṣepābhāvānniścalā dhīryasya tathābhūtaḥ san bhavataḥ kalām acalādyavasthāṁ dhyāyati |
T12n2957u_001:1587: tadā acirāt dhruvaṁ niścitamenaṁ janaṁ vasudhā svayamaprārthitā varayati svayaṁvaratvenopatiṣṭhata iti yāvat |
T12n2957u_001:1589: jaladhiḥ śakkarīva śakkarī mekhalā sā bhūṣaṇaṁ yasyāḥ |
T12n2957u_001:1610: te tvayā nirdhatumapi tāsāmeva kāntyā kamramiva |
T12n2957u_001:1611: yat kila niḥśeṣeṇa dhvastaṁ tat kāntaṁ na bhavatītīvaśabdaḥ |
T12n2957u_001:1614: bhagavataśca viraktatvādamarayoṣita eva bhagavatkāntisaṁdarśanāt kamramiva tadvibhrati ||
T12n2957u_001:1616: vṛttapakṣe 'tiśakkaryā pañcāśākṣareṇa cchandasā yo bandhastena sāramutkṛṣṭamanaṅgavijṛmbhitaṁ nāma |
T12n2957u_001:1626: yasyā bhagavattanoraṅgeṣu avayaveṣvanupamatvena ramaṇīyā bhaṅgirbhaktiḥ kartrī udārāṇi mahānti bhagavata eva yānyaśeṣāṇi yamāryādirūpāṇi hariharā dirūpaviśeṣā vā |
T12n2957u_001:1631: akhaṇḍā yā ākhaṇḍaleṣvāsasya śakradhanuṣo lakṣmīstasyā vijayastasya yat paramaṁ dhāma sthānaṁ tasya vyāmā cāsau rūk ca vyāmaprabhā tanmālā yasyā asti sā tathā |
T12n2957u_001:1640: bhaṇati mudā pratīṣṭajinabhāra bhāratī svamahimakāminī tava sabhāsu madrakam || 83 ||
T12n2957u_001:1644: pratīṣṭo 'numato jinasya bhāraḥ parārthabhāro yena sa saṁbodhyate |
T12n2957u_001:1646: kāmayate ajā noyate'taḥ sā bhāratī tava sabhāsu madrakaṁ rāgaviśeṣaṁ bhaṇati |
T12n2957u_001:1648: avikalaḥ samastālastena śālī kalo 'vyaktamadhuro yasyāḥ sā kākalī |
T12n2957u_001:1650: saiva ravastena vyatikarā miśrā vā vallakī vīṇā tayā valitaṁ cārū pañcamaṁ sthānaṁ yayā sā ||
T12n2957u_001:1662: he nātha tava avasthāviśeṣe durgatimārgamahārgalo bhuja eva tarūḥ sajjanaviśrāmabhūtatvāt jayati |
T12n2957u_001:1667: evaṁbhūtaṁ śṛṅkhalajālaṁ yattannibhamaṅgadaṁ keyūraṁ tena bhūṣitaḥ |
T12n2957u_001:1668: tathā prakṛṣṭo mado yasya sa cāsau manmathaśca tasya nirmathanaḥ |
T12n2957u_001:1671: vṛttapakṣe ihāpi vibhaktivipariṇāmena saṁbandhādatiśakkarībandhasāraḥ sugatapriyo nāma |
T12n2957u_001:1680: tava varavijayasamupacitayaśasaḥ śriyamanuharati hi śaradi śaśikalā || 85 ||
T12n2957u_001:1685: tava varāṇāṁ suraśreṣṭhānāṁ vijayena samupacitaṁ yadyaśastasya śriyam |
T12n2957u_001:1689: bhavaśirasi saṁsāramastake mahito guṇamahimā tavaiva yasmādbhavatīti tām |
T12n2957u_001:1691: śaśikalāpi bhavasya maheśvarasya śirasi vartamānā mahitaguṇamahimno bhūrāśrayaḥ |
T12n2957u_001:1707: paṭuparimalamilitasya madhukarayūno bhramaṁ sahate yaḥ śitisugato 'kṣobhyastasya samucitaṁ vardhitaṁ sukhaṁ yayā |
T12n2957u_001:1708: tasyaiva sākṣāttatra suparimala yogāt sā tathā |
T12n2957u_001:1712: sā ca raseṣu ṣaṭsu layo bhaṅgastadvatī ||
T12n2957u_001:1716: na yatipadamayasi yadatidayadhiyaḥ prathayasi jagati ca parahitakṛtinaḥ |
T12n2957u_001:1721: atikrāntā dayāṁ dhīryeṣāṁ tān prati yadyasmāt |
T12n2957u_001:1722: na yatīnāṁ śāntarūpāṇāṁ padamayasi gacchasi saumyasvabhāvaṁ vihāya krodharūpeṇa damayasyeveti bhāvaḥ |
T12n2957u_001:1723: yacca parahite kṛtinaḥ prajñāvato jagati prathayasi vistārayasi |
T12n2957u_001:1724: itistasmāt himacayarūcirbhavato guṇānāṁ nikaro viyadākāśaṁ janayati |
T12n2957u_001:1748: tava guṇagaṇasya parimitimudadhiṣu vartamāno maṇinikaraḥ kathamiva samiyāt sametu |
T12n2957u_001:1752: udadhiṣviti bahuvacananirdeśāt ekaśeṣādvā praticatuṣkaṁ yati lakṣito draṣṭavyaḥ |
T12n2957u_001:1769: kiṁ bata nikhilasya jagata ucitā paribhuk paribhogastasyā avani tadvat |
T12n2957u_001:1772: śiśuralpā matistayā kalito yaḥ sakalo janastasya bahuvidhaṁ vimatervipratipatterlalitaṁ yattasya vidhibhiḥ ||
T12n2957u_001:1780: prati jaḍadhiyamiha samadhikagurūdaya mṛdumatirapi tava śubhamayasamudaya |
T12n2957u_001:1785: jaḍadhiyaṁ prati lakṣyīkṛtya samadhikagurvī dayā yasya tasyāmantraṇam |
T12n2957u_001:1789: iha jagati mṛdumatirapi jano jinakuvalayaṁ muditādibhūvalayaṁ tavāviṣamabharamadurvahabharamiti kalayati |
T12n2957u_001:1793: tacca ḍalayoraikyāt jaladhiṁ prati yamo yatirasyāstīti tathā ||
T12n2957u_001:1806: tathā ca 'ārṣabhaṁ siṁhanādaṁ nadāmi' iti prayogaḥ |

T12n2957u_001:2347: tvayyārabdhāvandhyārādho vidhurayati varada sudhiyāṁ virājatayā sfuran bhogāsakto'pīha svairaṁ viṣamatamaviṣayatanubhṛdbhujaṅgavijṛmbhitam ||
T12n2957u_001:2354: mutkṛtau pramodajananena praudā unmīlantī lāvaṇyaśrīryasyedamapi saṁbodhanam |
T12n2957u_001:2355: tathā bhavabhidāṁ buddhānāṁ giri vāgviṣaye sthitijanaka saddharmadhūrdhara |
T12n2957u_001:2357: tvayyārabdho 'vandhya ārādha ārādhanaṁ yena sa pumān |
T12n2957u_001:2358: he varada svairaṁ svacchandaṁ vidhurayati damayati |
T12n2957u_001:2360: viṣamatamā vinopāyaṁ bhujyamānatvenāniṣṭāvāhakatvād viṣayā rūpādayo yeṣāṁ te ca te tanubhṛtaśca ta eva bhayahetutvādbhujaṅgāsteṣāṁ vijṛmbhitam
T12n2957u_001:2363: sudhiyāṁ madhye viśeṣeṇa rājata iti virājatā tayā sfuran re |
T12n2957u_001:2366: viṣamatamaṁ viṣaṁ yāti śrayati sa cāsau tanuśca tadbhṛto ye bhujaṅgāsteṣāṁ vijṛmbhitaṁ vidhurayati ||
T12n2957u_001:2369: tacca girayo 'ṣṭau kulaparvatā rūdrāścaikādaśa teṣu bhidā bhaṅgena lakṣitam |
T12n2957u_001:2370: nanvanyatra saptaiva kulācalāḥ rājaḥ 'vasukula giribhiḥ syānmālinī nau mayau ya ' iti |
T12n2957u_001:2373: tathā cānargharāghavaḥ 'mūrtīraṣṭa maheśvarasya dalayannaṣṭau kulakṣmābhṛtaḥ ' iti |
T12n2957u_001:2375: madanadahano rūdra eva hi tatrābhimata rājaḥ vasumanasijariputuragairbhujaṅgavijṛmbhitam iti ||
T12n2957u_001:2385: akhilavipadapavāhamākhyā yasya tat tvatsevā tarūfalamiha jagatyabhiyuktātmā puruṣo 'nubhavati |
T12n2957u_001:2390: ālocanamālocanaṁ prati samudayinaśca te navarasāśca śṛṅgārādayaḥ |
T12n2957u_001:2399: nava ca rasāśca teṣu padaṁ yasya tattathā |
T12n2957u_001:2406: anibhṛta bhujadaṇḍaṣaṇapracaṇḍānilollāsitaḥ śrāntiśāntiṁ tanotīva te pralayasamayaśaṅkayā yatra lokatrayīdaṇḍakaścaṇḍavṛṣṭiprayāto'mbudaḥ ||
T12n2957u_001:2411: kārūṇyakrīḍayā sfuraccārūpadyanarteśvarākāralīlāyitaṁ tava jayati jayatīti saṁbhrama ābhīkṣṇye vā dvirūktiḥ |
T12n2957u_001:2413: capalacaraṇābhyāṁ pīḍitena agānāmadhipena merūṇā tadupari natenāta upetasya pātālasya bhayāt tālunā ucchalatā vyālapālena bhujagapatinā stutam
T12n2957u_001:2414: yatra padyanarteśvarākāralīlāyite nṛtyatvarayā anibhṛtānāṁ bhujadaṇḍānāṁ ṣaṇḍena saṁdohena ullāsitaścaṇḍayā vṛṣṭhayā prayā ( ? )
T12n2957u_001:2416: nṛtyato hi śramo bhavati sa cānilollāsitena varṣatā payodenāpohyata iti bhagavato'pi tathaivotprekṣyate |
T12n2957u_001:2419: vineyaviśeṣamanujighṛkṣoḥ khalu bhagavataḥ kṛpākelinirbharatāṇḍavārambhe 'tyadbhutodbhaṭavikaṭabhujadaṇḍamaṇḍalaprabhavaprabhañjanajavairūjjṛmbhitaḥ sasaṁrambhamambhobhṛdakāṇḍapracaṇḍavāridhārāndhakārārabdhadurdinaḥ saṁvartaḥ saṁvṛtta iti cetasi trāsamāntanvānaḥ pīḍayatyāhatya jagattrayaṁ paryante tu parahitaikapariṇāmamadhura eva ||
T12n2957u_001:2427: pratipadamiha jātaśuddheḥ samādhestrayasyākṣarasyābhisaṁvardhanādantyarūpaspṛśaḥ samadhigamavaśājjayatyāryavaryaiḥ prabhūtapramodaiḥ pragītaḥ prabhāvaprakarṣastava |
T12n2957u_001:2434: prabhūtapramodairāryavaryaiḥ pragītastava prabhāvaprakarṣa iha jagati jayati |
T12n2957u_001:2440: yasya ca pragītasvabhāvasyānumodanāvādena yatsārāviṇaṁ saṁbhūya ravaṇaṁ tatrātṛptacittaiḥ surairvādyamānāḥ śramaṁ viśrāmaṁ na yānti | ke |
T12n2957u_001:2442: arṇavasya vyālā iva kārṣṇyāt ye jīmūtāsteṣāṁ manojñadhvanitvena līlākarā ye uddāmaśaṅkhādayaste ||
T12n2957u_001:2444: vṛttapakṣe iha caṇḍavṛṣṭiprapāte 'ntyānāṁ trayāṇāma kṣarāṇāṁ gurūlaghukrameṇa yadrūpaṁ tatspṛśastrayasyākṣarasya pratipadaṁ pratipādamabhisaṁvardhanāt
T12n2957u_001:2445: arṇārṇavavyālajīmūtalīlākaroddāmaśaṅkhāayo ye te daṇḍakabhedāḥ śramaṁ viśrāmaṁ paryantaṁ na yānti aparyantā iti yāvat |
T12n2957u_001:2454: daśabalatanayavargāgrimeṇa tvayā nātha nirmāthiduḥkhāpahena stutena pracita iti śubharāśirmahān yastataḥ stājjanaughe samṛdhiḥ samagre'pi saiva
T12n2957u_001:2462: tribhuvanasya śamo nirvāṇaṁ tadvidhānārtha nirvāṇanīvṛnnivaraṇaṁ yasya |
T12n2957u_001:2463: tathā tamālākṛtau śyāme bhavārau bhagavatyakṣobhye āttā bhaktiryena sa tathā |
T12n2957u_001:2468: iti yathoktakramastutena yo mayā mahān śubharāśiḥ pracitastataḥ śubharāśerbhagavato yā samṛddhiḥ saiva janaudhe 'pi samagre stādbhavatu ||
T12n2957u_001:2474: daśabalatanayavargasyāgrimeṇa jyeṣṭhena mayā gaṅgadattena nirvāṇaṁ nayatīti nirvāṇanīrvṛttamāleyaṁ kṛtā |
T12n2957u_001:2478: samṛddhiḥ saiveti yaivāntyākṣaratrayasya caṇḍavṛṣṭiprapāte saṁtatyā vṛddhiḥ saiva pracite'pi |
T12n2957u_001:2483: tena vakṣyamāṇe 'pi pravṛttākhye pracitavadakṣaratrayasya vṛddhau nāmāntaram ||
T12n2957u_001:2492: na kevalaṁ janaughe 'pi saiva samṛddhiḥ stādahamapi tribhuvanasya paramopakāra evaikaṁ kṛtyaṁ tatra pravṛttaścareyaṁ janmaśitayā tāvadyāvadeko'pi sattvo na mukta ityāryamañjuśriya iva praṇidhānaṁ vidhatte |
T12n2957u_001:2494: tava pādapadyayorabhi saṁbodhane 'dhīnayā dhiyā samyagnirūddhamāntaraṁ dhvāntajātaṁ yasya |
T12n2957u_001:2495: ata eva samyagadhigataṁ samastavastu visaraṇaśīlamabādhitatvāt naiḥ sargikaṁ svapnamāyāmayamadvaita eva grāhyagrāhakābhāvādadvaita tattvaṁ yena
T12n2957u_001:2496: akarūṇeṣu yā karūṇā tasyā balaṁ cāvāryavīryodayaśca tābhyāmārabdhayā nānāvidhayā vyāpṛtyā caryayā dhvastā mārā yena sa tathā |
T12n2957u_001:2500: pracite prathamaṁ ṣaḍ laghavastata ādilaghukāni trikāṇi sapta |
T12n2957u_001:2511: sarvadurvāramārapravīrāṇāṁ dhvajinyāḥ senāyā uddhavasyotsavasya dhvaṁse yā baddhā abhirāmāsamapraudistasyā nirvyūdayā gādo 'tyarthatīvraḥ pratāpodayo yasya sa eva vāgīśvaraḥ kumāro jayati |
T12n2957u_001:2513: sfārafullasthalāmbhojasya nirbhāsaṁ sādṛśyaṁ birbhati yatpādapīṭhaṁ tasyānte viśrāntaḥ kānto 'marendravyāḍendradaityendrāṇāṁ cūḍopalasya cūḍāratnasyārciścayo yasya sa tathā |
T12n2957u_001:2514: duḥsahoddāmaduḥkhānalena grastā ata eva paryastā vyākulā śaktiryasyāḥ sā cāsau trilokī ca tasyā viśokīkriyāyāṁ nirvirāmaśramatvādevāścaryā yā caryā tasyā nidhiḥ |
T12n2957u_001:2515: śuddhasaṁbuddhavaṁśasyāvataṁso bhūṣaṇaṁ tadvatprakāśate yā sfurantī kīrtitstayā kīrṇo vyāpto 'ntarālaprasāro yenāsau tathā ||
T12n2957u_001:2536: gādamatyarthaṁ vinigūdāśrliṣṭā dayā vismayamayī āścaryakarī apratimaraudrā ca tanuryasya tam |
T12n2957u_001:2540: tathā śuddhānāṁ guṇānāṁ daśabalādīnāṁ dhāma sthānam |
T12n2957u_001:2542: ata eta udārā nava nāṭyarasā yasya santīti matup |
T12n2957u_001:2562: karūṇāvaśavarti bhavadvapuḥ kasya mano na karotyupacitram || 125 ||
T12n2957u_001:2566: karūṇāvaśena vartituṁ śīlaṁ yasya tadidaṁ bhavato vapuḥ kasyacit draṣṭurūpacitraṁ mano na karoti |
T12n2957u_001:2569: kathaṁ tathā karoti yasmādabālaśaśiprabha mardha mādadhāti |
T12n2957u_001:2575: vṛttapakṣe idaṁ yathoktaṁ pūrvārdhamidaṁ cāparārdhamādadhadupa citramardhasamaṁ vṛttam |
T12n2957u_001:2577: yatra ca liṅgāntaraṁ tatra liṅgavipariṇāmena saṁbandhanīyam |
T12n2957u_001:2587: bhavasya saṁsārasya mathanaṁ śrutaṁ yasya bhavamathane vā śruto viditaḥ |
T12n2957u_001:2594: 'tvaccaraṇānucareṇa na bhāvyaṁ bhavamathanaśruta na drutamadhye iti padyālaṁkārasūtram |
T12n2957u_001:2595: tatra adhyā tvaccaraṇānu careṇa na na bhāvyamityarthaḥ ||
T12n2957u_001:2601: kimuśanti budhā adhikaṁ vibho yadi janīya tadīyatanurbhavet |
T12n2957u_001:2609: yadi tava dṛṣṭisudhārasadhārayā sfuritahārarūcā tadīyā teṣāṁ tanurhariṇī cāsau plutā ceti tādṛśī bhavati |
T12n2957u_001:2611: hāreṇāpi hṛdi sfuratā tanuḥ vimalā vyāptā ca bhavati ||
T12n2957u_001:2622: taveti vakṣyamāṇenābhisaṁbandhādiyaṁ tava mukhaśrīḥ puṣpitāgrā vikasitaparyantā |
T12n2957u_001:2627: nijadhīśriyeti tu yadi pāṭhaḥ syātsyādarthasya samīcīnatā |
T12n2957u_001:2639: idaṁ tava dakṣiṇaṁ mukhaṁ nīlatvādutpalaprakararūcāṁ saṁcaya iva bhāti |
T12n2957u_001:2640: aparaṁ ca vāmavakraṁ śuklatvāt kairavasya śriyeva samuditaṁ samutpannamīdṛśamatisundaraṁ mano harati ||
T12n2957u_001:2646: idamardhasamaṁ samīkṣyate te bata vṛttaṁ jayino jagattrayasya |
T12n2957u_001:2651: tava jagattrayajayina iyaṁ lalitāpi śiśulīlā yadya smāt |
T12n2957u_001:2652: kkacidarthavidhau paraprayojanasaṁpādananimittaṁ vidhūtaviśvā rūpāntareṇa kampitajagattrayā bhavati |
T12n2957u_001:2653: ata idaṁ vṛttamardhasamaṁ yasya tathā samīkṣyate |
T12n2957u_001:2661: kathamastu na viśvabhāratī nijadāsīva tava priyaṁvadā || 131 ||
T12n2957u_001:2666: ākrāntā jagattrayyāḥ śikhā śikharaṁ brahyāṇḍaṁ yena tādṛśaṁ te tava padamavekṣya jitasya ekapādatalākrāntarūpasya viśvasya bhāratī nijadāsīvapriyaṁvadā na kathamastu |
T12n2957u_001:2669: trivikramasyāpyuktarūpaṁ padamekamavalokya sarasvatī caturānanā nalinavanarājahaṁsī dāsīva priyaṁvadā saṁvṛttā ||
T12n2957u_001:2676: svarasopanatāṁ śamaśayyāṁ kiṁ nu vidhūya dhiyo 'pyatidurgaiḥ |
T12n2957u_001:2677: aticitracaritraśataiste vegavatī karūṇā yadi na syāt || 132 ||
T12n2957u_001:2681: yadi te tava karūṇā vegavatī duḥkhārte jagati viśvagāṇupracārā na bhavettadā śama eva śayyā śame vā śayanam |
T12n2957u_001:2682: tāṁ svarasopanatāṁ vidhūya aticitracaritra śataiste kim |
T12n2957u_001:2692: lokasya gatāpi hi smṛtiṁ te bhadraṁ bhadravirāṭtanustanoti || 133 ||
T12n2957u_001:2696: bhadreṇa virāja ta iti bhadravirāṭte tava tanuḥ sarvasya lokasya smṛtiṁ gatāpi smaraṇaviṣayabhūtāpi na kevalamevaṁbhūtā bhadraṁ tanoti |
T12n2957u_001:2700: tathā sarvāṅgīṇā sarvāvayavavyāpikā sulakṣyā suvyaktā lakṣaṇānāṁ śrīḥ saṁpattiryasyāḥ ||
T12n2957u_001:2711: parārtha eva paramo'rthaḥ prayojanaṁ yeṣāṁ taiḥ pavipadyakhaḍgamaṇicakrairakṣobhyāmitābhāmoghasiddhiratnasaṁbhavavairocanacihnaiḥ ketumatī tava kīrtiḥ pañcātmikasamājamaṇḍale vibhāti |
T12n2957u_001:2716: 'ketumatī svareṣu carame 'ṅge' iti padyālaṁkārasūtrādatra prathame pāde raseṣu carame svareṣu yatiriṣṭā |
T12n2957u_001:2721: caittamātra bhāvabhāji bhāvyate kka parā parārthasaṁpadīdṛśī dayāyām |
T12n2957u_001:2729: tadbhāji caittasvabhāvāyāṁ dayāyāṁ dayāviṣaye īdṛśī sarvākārapravṛttā parā parārthasaṁpat kka saṁbhāvyate |
T12n2957u_001:2731: ataḥ seyaṁ dayaiṣokta lakṣaṇā yā bhagavadākṛtistadeva cchalaṁ tataḥ |
T12n2957u_001:2740: ṛjunā krameṇa saṁjñāpraveśo na nirvahatīti pūrveṣāmevaiṣa vākyavinyāsaḥ |
T12n2957u_001:2742: tatra priyaṁvadāvegavatī bhadravirāṭketumatīnāṁ pratyekamayukpādau daśākṣarau yukpādāvekādaśākṣarau |
T12n2957u_001:2753: he atibhava tava tanuriyamatirūcirā satī nikhilajagadabhirūcikṛtau paṭurjayati |
T12n2957u_001:2755: udayaṁścāsau arūṇākiraṇaparikaro yaḥ kanakamayaḥ kanaka vikāraḥ himakaraśca tayorjayanī varṇāhlādakāritvābhyām |
T12n2957u_001:2761: etanmate tu prathamaḥ pādaḥ ṣoḍaśākṣaro dvitīyaḥ pañcadaśākṣara iti catuṣpadīyamati rūcirā |
T12n2957u_001:2762: tathā ca padyālaṁkārasūtram 'acaladhṛtiratha tithiraparamata iti yamaviratacaraṇayatiratirūcirā iti ||
T12n2957u_001:2778: tasyāḥ sacivānāṁ tādṛśānāṁ vimalamaṇīnāṁ nicayena khacitatvāt suparighaṭanalakṣaṇasya vasatiḥ |
T12n2957u_001:2779: tathā nijanayasya bodhi sattvanīteryo gadanaravastasya layo 'nutkaṭatā tasya lavaḥ |
T12n2957u_001:2782: parimalena miladalikulaṁ ca tasya yat kkaṇitaṁ guñjitaṁ tannidhiḥ ||
T12n2957u_001:2791: aparimitasukṛtafalamadhipa tava jayati sakalajinanayanayanagīrṛjumatiṣu niyatamṛjuramṛtakuṭa kuṭilamatiṣu niratiśayakuṭila padā || 138 ||
T12n2957u_001:2801: tatra samupanatarūciṣu vineyeṣu vividhaṁ samudayasya karaṇamupāyamabhidadhatī praśamasukhalakṣaṇe rase rasikamatiṣu nirūpamasya śamasukhapathasya kathane pṛthuniratistatparatā yasyāḥ sā tathā |
T12n2957u_001:2804: ṛjumatiṣu sattveṣu niyatamṛjuravakrapadā kuṭilamatiṣu tu niratiśayakuṭilapadā ||
T12n2957u_001:2807: pareṣāṁ khañjeti mukhyaṁ nāma kuṭilapadādyu ktayā vyākhyāyate |
T12n2957u_001:2810: tena tatra yau yukpādau tāvihā yukpādau yau cāyukpādau tau yukpādau ||
T12n2957u_001:2819: tvāṁ stuvan bhūtaguṇairabhivyāharan bhavato guṇānāmiyamākhyānikā sāmastyenākhyānamiti yo mahān manyate |
T12n2957u_001:2824: yadyākhyānikā na bhavati kiṁ tarhi bhavatītyāha |
T12n2957u_001:2833: aśeṣāṇāṁ smaravairiṇāṁ buddhānāmākhyeyatākhyātiṁ nirvacanīyatāvyapadeśamanāśriteṣu guṇeṣu yā ākhyānikāsau vṛthābhimānasya mithyābhimānino janasya viparītapūrvā ākhyānikā |
T12n2957u_001:2840: ete ca padyālaṁkāre upajātiprastāva eva darśite iti || ||
T12n2957u_001:2846: saṁprati yathoddeśaṁ viṣama vṛttau bhagavantaṁ stauti |
T12n2957u_001:2850: guṇasāgara sāgarairapūritāṅgurīgarto viṣamaṁ daśāntare dayāṁ padacaturūdhvaṁ nayati bhāvam || 141 ||
T12n2957u_001:2855: na pūrito 'ṅgurīṇāṁ garto yasya sa tava pādo 'sodaḥ sodumaśakyaḥ |
T12n2957u_001:2861: tasya pādasya gādamajjanādanuvṛddhairapi sumerūpariveṣṭikāḥ sapta bāhyaśca mahaudadhirityaṣṭau sāgarā iti viṣamaṁ rūpaṁ dayāṁ tava bhāvamabhiprāyaṁ nayati prāpayati |
T12n2957u_001:2872: laghugurūniyatibhṛti bhayamayati ko na bhavasi na yadi niyatamabhividhivacanamanu pīḍaḥ || 142 ||
T12n2957u_001:2876: ityanantaroktaprakāreṇa nigaditāyāṁ jātau svabhāvaviṣame tava ko na bhayamayati gacchati |
T12n2957u_001:2882: vineyā nurodhāt kkacillāghavaṁ ca kkacidgauravaṁ ca bibhratyām |
T12n2957u_001:2884: sarva eva bhayamāsādayati yadi tvaṁ niyatamabhividhivacanamanu pīḍo na bhavasi |
T12n2957u_001:2889: vṛttapakṣe nigaditāyāṁ padacaturūrdhvajātau kṛtaviṣamacaraṇaracanāyāmetacchlokaprastārakrameṇa laghugurūniyamaṁ dadhatyāṁ satyām |
T12n2957u_001:2903: viṣamajanadamanī ghaṭitā vikaṭā mūrtiryena tasya tava |
T12n2957u_001:2904: tripuraharasya maheśvarasya mukuṭamaṇiḥ śaśikalā tatsadṛśī daśanakalikeyaṁ bhāti |
T12n2957u_001:2915: te tavānantaroktarūpasya nayanasya yo valanalavo manāgāvarjanaṁ tasya līlāprasabhamabhimukhāgataṁ śamanamapi yamamapi praśamayati |
T12n2957u_001:2917: prasarantī urūdahanasya ghanatvāt ghorā cchaṭā yasmiṁstādṛśamanavadhi gaganaṁ kaṭākṣajvālājaṭilatvāddadhānā |
T12n2957u_001:2947: he īśa iyaṁ tavānantaroditarūpā tanuḥ kṛpayā kayāpyanirvacanīyayā niśamudgatā jaladarāśiṁ jayati |
T12n2957u_001:2954: ebhirūpamāna gatairviśeṣaṇairūpameyasya bhagavato yathāsaṁkhyaṁ praharaṇakiraṇairaujjvalyaṁ śyāmatva pīnatve pracaṇḍanibiḍāṭṭahasitaṁ ca dhvanitam
T12n2957u_001:2968: ata eva karuṇāvaśādeva anyeṣāṁ duṣkaratarāṇi vilasitaśatāni tanvatastava |
T12n2957u_001:2969: paṭu sfuṭaṁ kīrte ridama dbhutaṁ saurabhakaṁ saundaryaṁ parimalo vākhilaṁ lokamāhlādayati |
T12n2957u_001:2970: yaśo hi śubhraṁ sugandhi ceti kavisamayaḥ |
T12n2957u_001:2976: vṛttapakṣe udgatāyā eva tṛtīyapādasyānyathātve yathādarśite saurabhakam ||
T12n2957u_001:2981: damayati tava bhuvanāni vapurlalitaṁ ca kiṁ tu vikaṭaṁ yadīdṛśam || 148 ||
T12n2957u_001:2985: lalitaṁ ca manoharamapi tava vapurbhuvanāni damayati |
T12n2957u_001:2987: kiṁ tu bhṛkuṭīkaṭākṣeṇa yukteṣu daśaneṣu vikṛtāni |
T12n2957u_001:2992: vṛttapakṣe udgatāyā eva tṛtīyapādasya yathādarśitamanyathātve lalitaṁ nāma pūrveṣāṁ kiṁ tu yadīdṛśamato nāmnā vikaṭaṁ yujyate || ||
T12n2957u_001:3001: marūdanatiśayarayaḥ pracupitamapi tava na sameti salīlam || 149 ||
T12n2957u_001:3005: prāgbhāraḥ sumervādiparvatāvanataśikharabhāgastasyātiśayaḥ paryantastādṛśe 'pyatidurgatvāadbhutabhīme samantāt sarvato dikṣu samaṁ tulyakālaṁ bhuvanānāmahitahataye yattava salīlaṁ pracupitaṁ mandagamanaṁ tadapi |
T12n2957u_001:3007: kiṁ bhūyo bhagavanbhavantamāśrayamāptaḥ sthirabhāra matulamārṣabhaṁ dadhānam |
T12n2957u_001:3017: api ca pracayena bhūyasā kuśalasyāsya nikāmanirmalasya |
